author: NorthJersey.com, Jessie Gomez, NorthJersey.com
title: Bronx Zoo tiger becomes first of its kind to test positive for coronavirus, officials say
description: Federal officials confirmed a tiger at the Bronx Zoo tested positive for COVID-19 after multiple animals developed virus symptoms.
content:
Atlanta Humane Society closed its doors to the public due to coronavirus, but these shelter pets are still getting lots of love and attention.
USA TODAY
